headline: SCE Extends More Than 500 Offers for Eaton Fire Recovery in Just Over 100 Days
summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif., February 13, 2026--Southern California Edison today announced a major milestone in the Wildfire Recovery Compensation Program, with more than 500 compensation offers extended to individuals and businesses impacted by the Eaton Fire. The program is designed to offer compensation in line with settlement values for similar claims in past wildfire lawsuits, with a more streamlined and much faster approach than litigation. In just 108 days since launching, relief offered to claimant

headline: Eversource Energy Q4 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y
summary: ES Q4 EPS tops estimates as revenues climb 13% y/y, operating income more than doubles, and the company guides 2026 EPS of $4.80-$4.95.

raw.headline: Eversource Energy Q4 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y
raw.summary: ES Q4 EPS tops estimates as revenues climb 13% y/y, operating income more than doubles, and the company guides 2026 EPS of $4.80-$4.95.

headline: UBS Downgrades Edison Intl to Neutral, Raises Price Target to $78
summary: UBS  analyst Gregg Orrill   downgrades Edison Intl (NYSE:EIX) from Buy to Neutral and raises the price target from $70 to $78.

raw.headline: UBS Downgrades Edison Intl to Neutral, Raises Price Target to $78
raw.summary: UBS  analyst Gregg Orrill   downgrades Edison Intl (NYSE:EIX) from Buy to Neutral and raises the price target from $70 to $78.
